text: Edith Eluma (born 27 September 1958) is a Nigerian former football defender. She played for the Nigeria women's national football team. She played at the 1991 FIFA Women's World Cup. She played for the Princess Jegede club in Nigeria. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:1991 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:Association football defenders
title: Edith Eluma
